xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/276392-China Circus on Ice 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rhZ5c2cyfLwAJMzXXKX2mgThdaN.jpg For more than a half a century, the Heilongjiang Acrobatic troupe kept audiences on the edge of their seats with a contemporary spin on traditional Chinese acrobatics. Then, the company's artistic director had an idea: Put the act on ice. Follow a group of graduates from the Wuqiao School of Acrobatic Arts as they train for the troupe's upcoming Aurora on Ice tour during the obstacle-filled preparations for their big opening night in Taipei. China Circus on Ice
